signIn.title: Sign In
signIn.description: Please sign in with your Google account

cancelPlan.title: Cancel Plan
cancelPlan.description: If you cancel your plan, the service will stop at the end of the current billing period.

dialog.title: Are you sure you want to cancel?
dialog.description: You can continue using the service until the end of the current billing period. Your plan will be canceled after that.

dialog.title: Resume your plan?
dialog.description: This will cancel the scheduled cancellation. Your subscription will auto-renew on the next renewal date.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your data. This action cannot be undone.

dialog.title: Are you sure?
dialog.description: This action cannot be undone. All data associated with your account will be permanently deleted.

empty.title: No plans available
empty.description: There are no plans available at this time.

changePlanDialog.upgradeDescription: Your plan will be upgraded immediately. The price difference will be prorated.
changePlanDialog.downgradeDescription: Your plan will be downgraded. The change will take effect at the end of your current billing period.

commercialLaw.heading: Notation Based on the Specified Commercial Transactions Act

address.label: Address
address.value: Sample Building 5F, 1-1-1 Chiyoda, Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo 100-0001, Japan

price.label: Price
price.value: As displayed on each service page (tax included)

additionalCost.label: Additional Costs
additionalCost.value: Internet connection fees are borne by the customer

paymentTiming.label: Payment Timing
paymentTiming.value: Payment is processed at the time of service subscription. Monthly plans are automatically renewed each month.

delivery.label: Service Delivery
delivery.value: The service is available immediately after payment is completed

cancellation.label: Cancellation and Refund Policy
cancellation.value: Due to the nature of digital services, refunds cannot be provided after the service has been delivered. Monthly plans can be canceled at any time and will remain available until the end of the current billing period.

environment.label: System Requirements
environment.value: Latest versions of Google Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Microsoft Edge are recommended

collection.title: Article 1 (Information We Collect)
collection.content: We may collect the following information in connection with the provision of this service:

items.1: Account information such as name and email address
items.2: Log information such as IP address, browser type, and access date/time
items.3: Information obtained through cookies and similar technologies
items.4: Payment-related information (credit card information is managed by our payment processor)

purpose.title: Article 2 (Purpose of Use)
purpose.content: We use collected personal information for the following purposes:

items.1: Provision and operation of this service
items.3: Service improvement and development of new features
items.4: Addressing violations of the terms of service
items.5: Sending important notices regarding the service

thirdParty.title: Article 3 (Disclosure to Third Parties)
thirdParty.content: We will not provide personal information to third parties except in the following cases: when the user has given consent, when required by law, or when necessary to protect a person's life, body, or property.

security.title: Article 4 (Security Measures)
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to prevent leakage, loss, or damage of personal information. Data is transmitted through encrypted communications and managed under appropriate access controls.

cookies.title: Article 5 (Use of Cookies)
cookies.content: This service uses cookies to improve user experience and for service analytics. Users can disable cookies through browser settings, but some features may become unavailable.

retention.title: Article 6 (Data Retention Period)
retention.content: We retain personal information to the extent necessary to achieve the purpose of use. When an account is deleted, associated personal information will be deleted within a reasonable period. However, this does not apply to information that is required to be retained by law.

rights.title: Article 7 (User Rights)
rights.content: Users have the right to request disclosure, correction, or deletion of their personal information held by us. Please contact our support team for such requests.

changes.title: Article 8 (Changes to This Policy)
changes.content: We may change this privacy policy as necessary. In the case of significant changes, we will notify users through this service. The revised policy shall take effect upon being posted on this website.

contact.title: Article 9 (Contact Us)
contact.content: For inquiries regarding this policy, please contact us through the inquiry form within the service or via our support email address.

acceptance.title: Article 1 (Application)
acceptance.content: These terms and conditions set forth the conditions for the use of this service. By using this service, users are deemed to have agreed to these terms.

definition.title: Article 2 (Definitions)
definition.content: In these terms, "the Service" refers to the web application provided by us and all related services.

registration.title: Article 3 (Account Registration)
registration.content: Users shall register an account by providing accurate and up-to-date information. Users are responsible for managing their own account information.

prohibited.title: Article 4 (Prohibited Activities)
prohibited.content: Users shall not engage in the following activities when using this service:

items.1: Actions that violate laws or public order and morals
items.3: Actions that interfere with the operation of the service
items.4: Unauthorized collection of other users' personal information
items.6: Other actions deemed inappropriate by us

suspension.title: Article 5 (Service Suspension)
suspension.content: We may suspend all or part of the service without prior notice to users in cases such as system maintenance, natural disasters, or other unavoidable circumstances.

liability.title: Article 6 (Disclaimer)
liability.content: We shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use of this service, except in cases of intentional misconduct or gross negligence on our part.

changes.title: Article 7 (Changes to Terms)
changes.content: We may change these terms without notice when deemed necessary. The revised terms shall take effect upon being posted on this website.

law.title: Article 8 (Governing Law and Jurisdiction)
law.content: These terms shall be governed by the laws of Japan. In the event of any dispute arising from this service, the Tokyo District Court shall have exclusive jurisdiction as the court of first instance.

commercialLaw.title: Commercial Transactions Act
commercialLaw.description: Seller information and transaction conditions based on the Specified Commercial Transactions Act.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Please review our terms of service. These terms set forth the conditions for using our service.

top.title: Top
top.description: A modern SaaS template built with Next.js, React, and TypeScript. Get started with authentication, payments, and i18n out of the box.

pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your needs. Monthly and yearly options available.

youtubeResearchVideos.description: Search and analyze trending videos to discover insights.
